name: Obamids
description:
Take control of an Obamid and cause mayhem with up to 20 people online in this physics based sandbox.

—Key Features—

•Variety of Obamids with more on the way.

•Obamids such as...

•Obama Pyramid, Cylinder, Sphere, Cube, and Cone. More on the way soon.

•Choose a name for others to see.

•Multiplayer with up to 20 people at once.

•Destructible Obama Spheres placed on the map with more variety coming soon.

•Completely physics-based movement. There is no max speed, it is up to you to master or exploit the physics to be able to traverse anything you want.

—Controls—

WASD - Move

Space Bar - Jump

Left Click - Stomp

ESC/P - Pause
